saao/saa02/P296062
a-de-e ša {1}{d}30-MAN-GAR-un MAN KUR-aš-šur{KI} DUMU {1}AN.ŠAR₂-DU₃-A MAN ŠU₂ MAN KUR-aš-šur{KI} TA@v {1}{d}AG-A-SUM-na x x x x x x x x x TA@v {1}{ITI}AB-a.a x x x x x x x x TA@v {1}aq-ri x x x x x x x x i-na ma-har {d}SAG.ME.GAR {d}dil-bat x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x MU AN.ŠAR₂ EN ṣi-i-ri x x x x ša a.a-bi ra-im-a-nu ša ke-nu-ti ša LUGAL AG₂-u₂-ni za-ia-ra-an-šu₂ u₂-hal-li-qu-ni man-nu ša da-bab ṭup-pi an-ni-e e-nu-u-ni o a-de-e DINGIR-MEŠ GAL-MEŠ i-haṭ-ṭu-u-ni x x ša₂ AN-e u KI.TIM ar-rat la nap-šu-ri GIG-tu₂ li-ri-im-šu₂-nu e-liš i-na TI.LA-MEŠ li-su-uh-šu₂-nu šap-liš i-na KI.TIM e-ṭim₂-ma-šu₂-nu A-MEŠ lu-u-za-am-me {d}30 {d}ŠEŠ.KI AN-e u KI.TIM SAHAR.ŠUB-pu ki-ma na-ah-lap-ti lu-u-hal-lip-šu₂-nu ma-za-sa-šu-nu TA@v ŠA₃ E₂.KUR E₂.GAL lu-hal-liq o NUMUN-MEŠ-šu₂-nu ṣa-lam-a-ni-šu₂-nu i-na IZI i-kar-ru-ru di-pa-ra-šu₂-nu i-na A-MEŠ u₂-bal-lu-u₂
